Comments.Message: Because the genre that you are passing in query string doesn't exist in sample data file. Query return no record to genreModel. Try to enter some genre that is defined in sample data file.

I think I found the answer to this one...

There is a 2nd web.config under the Views folder. When I add the connectionString code from the tutorial to this 2nd web.config in addition to the first web.config file, I now have data and no longer get the "Sequence contains no elements" exception.
